title: chat restriction
body:
so i got one of these a long time ago, and for sure i know i could get this one. but at this point idc anymore, i've tried reporting and being that player that mutes all and is mature, but some kids need to know that what they are doing is wrong, it's not funny, you aren't cool, and me saying " you're a little shit" or saying " i hope your mom forgets you at walmart", like sure may come off as toxic but i'm sorry that your parents can't discipline you and neither does this game when you make others games not enjoyable. so from now on if you see me in game, prepare to dodge. fuck league of legends and fuck this community. you don't get nothing for being positive. you don't get shit in this game


and i hope i see you kids  that talk shit at some of these league events, you won't be talking so much shit then. what are you they gonna do ban me for saying real shit to one of you smug kids. hope your parents around it's aboutta be a esport in the audience when i breaking your dads neck. gonna wish you didn't troll.


TL;DR: i need a life

replies.body: i muted them, then unmuted when my friend pmed me, you can only try so much , but hey overwatch isn't toxic, league is just a joke now.
You didnt mute everyone since you can quote what they said. You didnt try.
Someone needed to say this, Im glad you did. The sentimental liberals/far left safe space kids need to man up.
